game.name: Internal Incident
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Internal Incident – a top-down survival horror extraction shooter. Explore the hidden corners of a vast facility in search of resources while fighting off terrifying creatures lurking in the dark. Unveil the secrets of the abandoned complex and do everything you can to make it out alive.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Internal Incident – a top-down survival horror extraction shooter. Explore the hidden corners of a vast facility in search of resources while fighting off terrifying creatures lurking in the dark. Unveil the secrets of the abandoned complex and do everything you can to make it out alive.
